resources.string:
Coquó is Latin for "I cook"

Spend less time preparing meals, and more time feasting with friends and family...

 Coquó is a mobile culinary app to manage your kitchen to efficiently keep your pantry stocked, with the freshest possible ingredients, to feed you and your friends and family. The goal of Coquó is to reduce stress and allow you to spend less time shopping and preparing meals, and mroe time breaking bread with friends and family... 

 Use the hamburger menu above to navigate your pantry.
